duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a team lead for Maintenance technicians, overseeing and assigning work, and providing subject matter expertise and consultancy on equipment maintenance and repair.
Assist with personnel duties, including staffing, performance management, annual reviews, and time and attendance, during management absences.
Promote a safe work environment in compliance with federal and state regulations, conduct safety meetings, and monitor required repair campaigns and warranty procedures.
Inspect completed repairs, schedule inbound equipment, and monitor work in progress to ensure safety, correctness, and standard repair times.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
